original_text: Thou shalt have a place also without the camp, whither thou shalt go forth abroad:
korean_text: 네 진영 밖에 변소를 마련하고 그리로 나가되

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt have a place also
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 너는 장소를 가지게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: whither thou shalt go forth abroad:
